name: Traininf field blockout
description:
THANKS FOR VISITING!

This is a short prototype of a parkour training field that would show up between games in a Multiplayer FPS :D

Controls:

WASD to move

LShift to Sprint

LCtrl to slide

Press C to crouch, hold it to keep crouching

Space to jump

Walk horizontal/vertically to walls for wallrunning/mantling/ledge grabbing

Q to grapple like Pathfinder from Apex Legends 

Hope you enjoy :).
